alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 03 at 7:34PM CDT until November 04 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Trinidad. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Minor flooding to woodlands and low land areas will occur on the right bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 36.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 12.5 feet Wednesday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
